name: Micro Chalk #GameZanga
description:
Micro chalk is a platformer game that's based on the choice of the player in order to pass levels, the game start with a sotryline of a micro thing to rescue his princess, our little hero has three superpowers teleportation and speed and weight he gotta use them to pass levels

HOW TO PLAY : (INPUT)

qd or arrows to move.

Space to jump. 

& é " (1 2 3 of alpha numpad) to use super power and Alt to confirm teleportation.
